name: strand-modal
description: A modal container and semi-transparent blocker view to display developer defined content.

attributes.name: hidden
attributes.description: The visible state of the modal and blocker.

attributes.name: width

attributes.name: noscroll
attributes.description: Disable page scrolling while modal is open

attributes.name: dismiss
attributes.description: Whether or not the modal can be dismissed by the user.
